title: RSDesign | Creative Design Studio
description: RSDesign is a creative and professional design studio that has worked with over 20 companies, created 200+ flyers, and developed multiple complete visual identities. To strengthen its presence, a modern and highly optimized website was developed.

The site stands out for its exceptional speed, accessibility, and SEO optimization.

title: Omni Resto | Comprehensive Restaurant Management System
description: Advanced cross-platform desktop application designed to streamline restaurant operations management. Built with hexagonal architecture using Rust and React, this enterprise-grade solution handles everything from order management to financial control. Currently deployed and actively used by real clients, demonstrating robust performance in production environments.

Optimization of SQLite database queries and relationships

title: Universal Java Unit Converter
description: Powerful and versatile Java-based conversion application that seamlessly handles real-time currency exchange rates, precise temperature calculations, accurate time conversions, and comprehensive area and length measurements. Built with JavaFX for an intuitive user interface, this all-in-one converter tool integrates live currency API data to ensure up-to-date financial conversions while providing instant offline conversions for physical units. Perfect for students, professionals, and anyone needing quick, accurate unit conversions.
what_i_learned: Use an external API to obtain updated exchange rates.
Create designs with JavaFX.
Improve my programming skills in Java.
